summary: This document contains email correspondence regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein scheduled for the week of October 8, 2013. Amanda Kirby from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas is coordinating the meeting and mentions another associate, Caroline Kitidis, who is returning from London.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and is in communication with other associates regarding scheduling.

persons.name: Caroline Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is mentioned as someone who has previously met with Jeffrey Epstein and is returning from London.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual with whom the meeting is being scheduled.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein as part of her role at Deutsche Bank.
Caroline Kitidis has previously met with Jeffrey Epstein.
